text: this was the crowning moment for Alberto
Salazar his two biggest stars taking

u.s. athletics legend himself Salazar is
head coach at the prestigious Nike
Oregon project home to more Farah since

and staff who worked with Salazar have
made allegations to the BBC about
unethical practices and the use of
banned steroids
Steve Magnus was Alberto Salazar
assistant coach in 2011 he says he saw a

us 10,000 meter record holder Galen Rupp
and he took a photo of it it had
currently on testosterone medication
when I saw that I kind of jumped

on testosterone medication testosterone
oh it's obviously banned I mean I knew
that everybody knew that
in response Alberto Salazar says the
document is incorrect
and says what had been recorded as
testosterone medication a banned

boost
both he and Galen Rupp strenuously

heard a number of other allegations
including that Salazar experimented with

trigger a positive drugs test
manipulated anti-doping rules on medical

by Salazar he sort of a win at all costs
person it's hurting a sport you were
very close to about
mmm-hmm how difficult has it been doing

for years he was a super important

about that but he put me in this

ever will
endorsed the use of banned substances
I've always strictly followed world

within the origin project uses a
medication against the spirit of the

not taken any banned substances and
Alberto has never suggested that I take
a banned substance there is no

but if the allegations about Alberto
